Razor Claw smiled an ominous grin, "Better than Maximals or Predacons 
huh? I think I like that." He raised his hand and placed it on the 
facing of the CR chamber "If what you believe is true than I will 
fight by you." he thought of the alternative "And if what you say is 
wrong than I will die by you." A pledge of loyalty that could be 
fealt as well as heard.

Lunarpine stepped forward and placed a hand on Ice's shoulder, "Looks 
like you got a fan club." He didn't like the devotion that Razor Claw 
was showing to Ice, Predacons had a tendancy to change devotions like 
humans change socks, and both stunk.

 --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> "I have a feeling we are the next step, as it were. Like all life 
> that evolves. We are the next phase up in life. We are better than 
> Maximals and predacons. We will survive as they die out." She 
> smiled. "Think of it. We, you,me and Lunarpine will live and thrive 
> here. We will be the hunters instead of the hunted. We can live and 
> be in peace."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "So you're trying to say that we're freaks?" Razor Claw liked 
that 
> > even less than being a rogue, the rogues were hunted by the 
> factions, 
> > the freaks were hunted by everybody. "Predacons were designed to 
> > conquer, Maximals were designed to explore, why were we created?"
> >
